results.description: Glamorgan re-appoint Matthew Maynard as head coach for the next three years after an interim role in 2019.
results.title: Matthew Maynard: Glamorgan re-appoint coach on three-year deal

results.description: With the 2019 county cricket season over, keep up to date with the latest signings, departures and rumours for 2020.
results.title: County ins & outs - signings, departures and rumours

thumbnail.altText: Miguel Cummins has ended his West Indies career to join Middlesex as a Kolpak player

results.description: Captain Tom Abell says Tom Banton is the latest off Somerset's production line that also nurtured Jos Buttler and Craig Kieswetter.
results.title: Tom Banton: Somerset wicketkeeper-batsman compared to Jos Buttler & Craig Kieswetter

results.description: Somerset cruise to a comfortable six-wicket win over Hampshire in the last-ever Lord's final in the One-Day Cup.
results.shortTitle: Somerset ease to One-Day Cup final win
results.title: One-Day Cup final: Somerset beat holders Hampshire to win last-ever Lord's final

results.description: If Saturday's One-Day Cup final between Somerset and holders Hampshire is the last at Lord's, it should be a showstopper.
results.shortTitle: Somerset v Hampshire: The last Lord's final
results.title: One-Day Cup: Can Somerset & Hampshire serve up fitting showpiece in last Lord's final?

thumbnail.altText: Hampshire fast bowlers Kyle Abbott and Fidel Edwards will be hoping to contain Somerset's explosive batting line-up led by James Hildreth and Peter Trego

results.description: Relive Somerset's win over Hampshire at Lord's in the 2019 One-Day Cup final as it happened.
results.shortTitle: One-Day Cup final: Somerset triumph as it happened
results.title: One-Day Cup final live: Somerset triumph as it happened

results.description: Lancashire and England seamer James Anderson is hit on the leg while bowling in Hampshire's four-wicket One-Day Cup semi-final win.
results.shortTitle: Anderson injured as Hants beat Lancs
results.title: One-Day Cup: James Anderson injured as Hampshire beat Lancashire by four wickets

thumbnail.altText: James Anderson walks off after being injured for Lancashire

results.description: Watch highlights of Rilee Roussouw's impressive 85 which helps Hampshire beat Lancashire by four wickets, sending them to the One-Day Cup final v Somerset.
results.shortTitle: Rossouw innings helps Hampshire reach One-Day Cup final
results.title: One-Day Cup: Riley Rossouw innings helps Hampshire reach One-Day Cup final

results.description: Somerset defeat Nottinghamshire by 115 runs at Trent Bridge to reach the final of the One-Day Cup.
results.shortTitle: Somerset outplay Notts to reach Lord's
results.title: One-Day Cup: Somerset outplay Nottinghamshire by 115 runs to reach Lord's

results.description: Relive the One-Day Cup semi-finals as they happened as Somerset and Hampshire reach Lord's and James Anderson suffers a painful injury.
results.shortTitle: One-Day Cup semi-finals - Somerset and Hampshire win through to Lord's
results.title: One-Day Cup semi-finals: Somerset and Hampshire reach Lord's

results.description: Lancashire survive Middlesex's rescue bid at Lord's to book a One-Day Cup semi-final against Hampshire on Sunday.
results.shortTitle: Lancs into semis despite Middlesex rally
results.title: One-Day Cup: Lancashire survive brave Middlesex rally to book semi-final against Hampshire

thumbnail.altText: Lancashire's win against Middlesex at Lord's was inspired by two Jimmy Anderson run-outs - the first of them  to remove Max Holden

results.description: Tom Banton makes a List A best 112 as Somerset beat Worcestershire to set up a One-Day Cup semi-final with Notts.
results.shortTitle: Somerset win at Worcester to reach semis
results.title: One-Day Cup: Tom Banton hits one-day best ton as Somerset thrash Worcestershire

thumbnail.altText: Tom Banton made his second century on only his 16th List A appearance, beating his 102 in this season's first group game against Kent

results.description: Relive the One-Day Cup play-offs as Lancashire beat Middlesex in a thriller at Lord's and Somerset thump Worcestershire.
results.title: Relive the One-Day Cup play-offs as they happened

results.description: Wrexham-born seam bowler Roman Walker, 18, wins his first Glamorgan squad call-up for One-Day Cup games against Middlesex and Sussex.
results.shortTitle: Walker in line for Glamorgan debut
results.title: Roman Walker in line for Glamorgan debut in One-Day Cup

results.description: Yorkshire beat Northamptonshire in a dramatic finish to a rain-affected game in the One-Day Cup.
results.shortTitle: Yorkshire beat Northants in dramatic finish

results.description: Sam Robson's maiden one-day century helps Middlesex to a comprehensive 118-run win against Somerset.

results.title: One-Day Cup: Sam Robson hits 106 as Middlesex beat Somerset by 118 runs

results.description: North Group leaders Nottinghamshire suffer a first One-Day Cup loss of 2019 as they go down by five wickets to Worcestershire.
results.shortTitle: Notts suffer first defeat at Worcester
results.title: One-Day Cup: Worcestershire win to hand North Group leaders Notts their first defeat

thumbnail.altText: Tom Fell followed up his 53 against Warwickshire with an unbeaten 48 in the win over Notts
